name: bioVONTAGE® 8920
description: bioVONTAGE® 8920 is a tan, free-flowing powder produced via the traditional fermentation of dextrose with Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) bacteria. This process produces a complex mixture of organic acids, peptides and other fermented compounds that contribute a savory, fermented flavor. Like other fermented foods, e.g. vinegar, buttermilk etc, this product may provide a desirable flavor profile and help maintain the quality of the foods during shelf-life. bioVONTAGE® 8920 works well in foods that are both heated during production as well as ones that include no thermal processing.
